definition: China Banking Regulatory Commission (CBRC), abbr. for 中國銀行業監督管理委員會|中国银行业监督管理委员会[Zhong1 guo2 Yin2 hang2 ye4 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: CBRC shall, on the same day as issuing the approval certificate, submit to the Ministry of Commerce the approval certificate stub.
sentences.chinese: 银监会在代发当日将批准证书存根送商务部。

sentences.english: To administer and guide the operations of overseas resident offices of the Commission.
sentences.chinese: 管理和指导银监会驻外机构的业务工作。

sentences.english: To be responsible for the foreign-related protocol arrangement and administration, and reception for foreign guests.
sentences.chinese: 负责银监会涉外礼宾安排和管理，接待外宾来访。

sentences.english: The specific conditions for establishment of a branch shall be formulated by the CBRC separately.
sentences.chinese: 设立分支机构的具体条件由银监会另行制定。

sentences.english: To compile and administer the budgets for foreign affairs expenses of the Commission departments.
sentences.chinese: 负责银监会机关外事经费预算的编制及管理。

sentences.english: The China Banking Regulatory Commission recently accelerated research and investigation on affordable housing construction.
sentences.chinese: 银监会最近加紧了对保障住房建设的研究和调查。

sentences.english: To enact norms for foreign affairs and administration rules for foreign affairs activities of the Commission institutions.
sentences.chinese: 负责制定银监会系统外事规范和外事活动管理规定。

sentences.english: To be responsible for the internal audit of the Commission institutions.
sentences.chinese: 负责银监会系统的内审工作。

sentences.english: The China Banking Regulatory Commission has told banks to write off non-performing project loans by the end of this year, the person said.
sentences.chinese: 中国银监会已经通知银行在年底注销不良的项目贷款。

sentences.english: After examined and verified by the banking regulatory bureau, the application for extension shall be submitted to CBRC for verification and approval.
sentences.chinese: 延期申请经银监局审核同意后报银监会核准。

definition: China Insurance Regulatory Commission (CIRC), abbr. for 中國保險監督管理委員會|中国保险监督管理委员会[Zhong1 guo2 Bao3 xian3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Yin2 hang2 ye4 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
related.word: 中国银行业监督管理委员会

definition: China Securities Regulatory Commission (CSRC)/abbr. for 中國證券監督管理委員會|中国证券监督管理委员会[Zhong1 guo2 Zheng4 quan4 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
abbr. for various central banks, notably 中國人民銀行|中国人民银行[Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Yin2 hang2] and 中央銀行|中央银行[Zhong1 yang1 Yin2 hang2]

pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Wai4 hui4 Guan3 li3 ju2

definition: to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Yin2 hang2

definition: China Securities Regulatory Commission (CSRC)/abbr. for 中國證券監督管理委員會|中国证券监督管理委员会

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Bao3 xian3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
related.word: 中国保险监督管理委员会
